column1: How to access Paradigm Online University
column2:
Follow the following document on how to access Paradigm Online University (POU):

\\rbivwinpdfs01.rokan.local\Share\CIFS\PHR\rumbai\data\documentation\EPOS\NEW_TRN\02_MODULE - 2.1 GUIDELINE TO PARADIGM ONLINE UNIVERSITY.pptx

column1: I am getting error "Fatal Error: Cannot create CSS Manager" when I launch Epos
column2:
Please close all Epos application and DON'T save your session.
Then relaunch session manager by command mulai_epos asset_team

column1: I am getting error "PNS host inconsistently resolves" when I launch Epos
column2: Please contact IT Linux support to update the IP Address at /etc/hosts file on your linux machine

column1: I am getting error "Failed to initialize embedded Coordinate Service" when I launch Epos
column2: Please contact IT Linux support to update the domain name at /etc/hosts file on your linux machine

column1: I am getting error "License Number of users already reached"
column2: Please as the IT Epos Support to release and refresh Epos license
PHR email

column1: I am geeting Error "Please verify the write permission and available disk space at directory"
column2: Please contact IT Linux support to get directory permission

column1: I am getting error " SQLite: database or disk is full41' while running StratEarth or SKUA
column2: /Var folder on your workstation is full, Please contact IT Linux support to delete files under /var folder

column1: I can't save my Epos Session with error " Lock: Type: read User: mk.alfian.gumelar Created: 2022/03/14
column2: Delete Locked File under File > Project > Manage Locked > Select lock file then delete

column1: I am geeting Error "no markers found for mistie calculation" while calibrating grid to markers in Basemap
column2: Assign Marker to Horizon in Well Data Manager before calibrate grid to Well Markers

column1: I am geeting Error " Severe Error from: Corba Data Server storeWellList error. access denied" while Importing Directional Survey and Create Well List
column2: no permission to create a new well in proposed well database. Ask the Epos IT to Add Permission to Access, Create/Modify well database

column1: How to Create Well Circle Drainage Radius in Basemap
column2: Follow the following document on how to Create Well Circle Drainage Radius in Basemap https://collab1.rokan.local/sites/NG/WU/_layouts/15/WopiFrame.aspx?sourcedoc={e5430c8b-69e6-416d-9beb-e6586a12697e}&action=edit&source=https%3A%2F%2Fcollab1%2Erokan%2Elocal%2Fsites%2FNG%2FWU%2FTips%2520and%2520Tricks%2FForms%2FAllItems%2Easpx%3FRootFolder%3D%252Fsites%252FNG%252FWU%252FTips%2520and%2520Tricks%252FFAQ%25202022%26FolderCTID%3D0x01200082EF59A6A9E948478850E86359569857%26View%3D%257BCD869C46%252D929E%252D41A0%252D9991%252D36DD7232FD2A%257D%26InitialTabId%3DRibbon%252ERead%26VisibilityContext%3DWSSTabPersistence

In Menu Edit ->Turn On Objecs Icon in Display Element-> Select Well Section-> Delete -> Filter on Well Section (https://ptptmn.sharepoint.com/:v:/r/sites/EposRokanOnsites/Shared%20Documents/Video_Tips/How_to_Delete_Well_Section.mp4?csf=1&web=1&e=LaKXp4)
In Menu File -> Project ->  Manage Locks -> Select the lock -> Delete lock
Marker needs assigned as a feature (need to do in WDM first before run StratEarth)
Select Well in Display Elements-> RMB -> Add Track -> Zone and toggle on Perforation track in the well

column1: How to apply template on cross-section
column2: In Display Elements-> Select Well -> RMB -> Style ->  Apply template -> Select Template -> Select Objects (well) -> Apply
In Display Elements-> Turn on Well Track Templates Tab -> Select the template-> RMB -> Copy
In Display Elements-> Select the template > RMB -> Delete
In Display Elements-> Select the well -> RMB -> Edit -> Double Click on Color Table.
In Display Elements-> Select the well -> marker -> RMB -> Rename over related markername
In Display Elements-> Select the template-> RMB -> Save to Epos Preference over well

column1: How to save template to Epos Preferences
column2: In Display Elements-> Select the template -> RMB -> Save To Epos Preferences

column1: How to apply style in well header
column2: In Display Elements-> Select Well > RMB -> Style> Style Editor ->  Header -> Select header/imported header
In Display Elements-> Select Well > RMB -> Style> Style Editor -> Toggle off show original marker set
Use Compute -> thickness between 2 markers. Need to specify facies, which should be calculated prior this step
In Display Elements-> Select Well Marker  > RMB on marker name> delete
In Menu File -> Import -> Gocad Resources -> Template
In Display Elements-> Select Well Marker ->RMB on marker > rename
In Display Elements-> RMB on marker > save markers set > select well and stratigraphy context

column1: I can't send traverse from basemap to StratEarth
column2: Lost connection PNS with error"Fatal Error: Cannot create CSS Manager". Exit from Session MAnager then relauch Session Manager then reopen session
Depend on objective, related objective will use Grid, Recommend to use Mathematical Operation for contants grid ( File = Z; )
In Menu File -> Open Interpretation > Select the correct Data type -> Fault Outline
In Menu File -> Open Interpretation -> Select the correct Data type -> Grid/Pick -> Select the name and click OK
In Menu File -> Open Traverse -> Select the traverse name -> Ok

column1: How to extract markers from grid
column2: In Menu Interpretation -> Extract Markers from Grid -> Select grid -> Select Well list -> Select/Create Tops Name-> Set Name  Class -> Ok

column1: How to calibrate grid to wells
column2: In Menu Mapping -> Calibrate Grid to wells -> select Well Marker Two way time (info) > Show Statistic
In Menu Mapping -> Create Control points

column1: How to create grid from control points
column2: In Menu Mapping -> Create Grid ->  Select Source Control point
Can create using manually draw or automatically using 3DC or as result of SKUA model.
in Grid object -> RMB - > Create contour. Show how to modify paramters.

column1: How to create contour from t-surface
column2: in T-surface object -> RMB -> Create Contour. Over related object

column1: How to modify culture display properties
column2: in Culture object -> RMB -> Culture properties

column1: How to display markers on Basemap
column2: in Well object -> RMB -> Properties -> markers over well
In Culture -> RMB -> Properties-> Change Definition from Database to User defined to modify the color
Create new contour with toggle on fill contours while option to create fill contours with color
Use Menu toolbar -> General Line selection
Open and Select Grid and Polygon Name, Click on planimeter icon at right toolbar then select polygon using mouse-> MB3-> Volumetrics -> set Based as constant value -> Apply
Select Grid -> RMB on grid > select contour icon or Grid -> Create Contour ->  Set the parameter range and interval -> Apply
In Menu Edit > Create new Well -> Select well location using by moving mouse -> Click -> Click Continue -> WELL_NAME , WELL, Drilled Depth -> Next -> Done

column1: How to create well list from selected wells?
column2: Select capture icon on the right toolbar > select wells > RMB on selected well > create well list

column1: How to measure distance between wells
column2: Using ruler at right toolbar in basemap then draw line to measure
In Menu File > open interpretation > select fault outline
Under Customize Menu -> Preferences -> Wells -> Projection Distance
Properties > select markers
Please ask Epos admin to swtich off maintenance mode

column1: How to open another user session
column2: In Paradigm Session Manager > File > Load Session -> Select Other user session
In Paradigm Session Manager > File -> Load Session
In Paradigm Session Manager > File > Save Session
interemittent issue connect to pns server
PNS issue - System Issue
Possible cause : HP Velocity, turning off this feature can solve this issue
Check  the script, error log and remote storage issue
In Linux Terminal -> type command /util/scripts/app-run/mulai_epos regi

column1: Getting Error "Fatal Error: Cannot create CSS Manager"
column2: Exit Session Manager without save sessing then relaunch Session Manager
Paradigm Session Manager - Menu > File > open project
Paradigm Session Manager - Menu > File -> Save Session As.
Show Documentation on how to start Epos, ( mulai_epos did not work. Use complete path, as probably related datapath not added yet into PATH variable)
Command -> Cross-section -> New -> Create from polyline

column1: How to see histogram inside related polygon
column2: Create Region based on closed polygon. And display histogram, based on this Region
In Menu File -> Export -> GOCAD ASCII

column1: How to open wells from SKUA
column2: In Menu File -> Open wells -> Select related well list

column1: How to save SKUA model to epos
column2: In Menu File -> Save SKUA model.

column1: How to create region based on closed polygon
column2: In Object -> Region -> Create Inside Closed Polygon. Apply to related pointset.

column1: How to create well plan in SKUA
column2: Show how to use SKUA-CVX well planning

column1: How to avoid crossing surface between top and bottom
column2: Trasnfer Z of top surface to bottom, use , script if (Z<Ztop) { Z = Ztop-3;}. Number 3 is constant thickness for crossed section

column1: How to extract Map Properties at Well Location
column2: Using Macro from SKUA Application

column1: How to activate global velocity model
column2: From WDM -> Customize -> Well Domain Conversion … -> Use GVM.  For all wells.

column1: How to copy checkshot from one well to other
column2: in WDM -> Select well -> Select Checkshot -> Save as to -> select other well -> set name -> apply   (If to many lines, recommend to import it using ASCII Import/export )
Select wells. RMB -> Create well list based on selected wells

column1: How to update directional (and position )  survey
column2: Tested localy, proporse to promote on Pilot dataset
Well Data Manager > Domain Conversion > Checshot tab, select Well that have checkshot you want to copy then use right mouse button to select "Save As" select your target well
In Well Data Manager > Markers Tab > Markers Activity -> Marker Priority. Toggle on Apply Priority and  set Priority Marker
